expo.name: Electro
expo.description:
v0.5.4
- iOS build should work. The icons (tab bar, location button) are causing problems with the build, so they're not working currently.
- The online database currently has only one station with a valid address. These stations are now displayed in the list when an "infinity" search radius is selected.
 (note that addresses are still calculated by the app itself, using a Google Maps call, rather than the data from joinelectro.com).

v0.5.3
- Android fixes:
  - Location button appearance
  - Fix "Me" tab, logout
- Text inputs should now stay visible when keyboard is shown

Known bugs: 
- In Android, searching the map sometimes (usually) moves the map to a a region halfway across the world.
